events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position on May 1st, 2024 at 09:15 UTC.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's experience and job title.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's progress through the hiring process starting today.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call where technical skills and cultural fit were discussed in detail.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the interview scheduling request and expressed enthusiasm about the position.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for May 5th, 2024, at 15:00 UTC.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 8th, 2024, to discuss benefits, company culture, and finalize next steps.
HR interview completed successfully with discussions regarding candidate expectations and confirming mutual fit.
An employment offer was proposed to the candidate including details about salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and is preparing to start onboarding.
The candidate started the onboarding process, completing paperwork and attending orientation on May 15th.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
